titleStmt.title: The Cavaliers Bible, or a squadron of XXXVI. Several religions by them held and maintaied (sic). And the particulars of every of their tenents colledcted (sic), as also the particulars of the severall regiments and commanders expressed.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Jane Coe: according to order,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
